0.title: Night Shift
0.description: We don’t bore you with soppy love songs through the night shift. Instead, enjoy a great mix of songs, all night long.

0.title: Breakfast Without the Waffle
0.description: Get your fix of great songs in the morning with the news you actually need to know.  No waffle, no nonsense.

0.title: Great British Tea Break
0.description: It’s only mid morning and we’re already stopping for a tea break with a difference. Two hours of back to back classics from great British artists.

0.title: Solid Radio 80s
0.description: Enjoy an hour of the songs that weren’t only acceptable in the 80s but still sound great today.

0.title: Solid Radio 90s
0.description: A solid hour of 90s songs on Solid Radio. It’s as simple as that!

0.title: Solid Radio 00s
0.description: Here at Solid Radio, we understand just how difficult time travel can be. For one, you’ve got to remember to space as well! So, why not take the easy option and enjoy the songs of the 00s without going to the trouble of actually travelling there.

0.title: Afternoons
0.description: Enjoy great songs throughout the afternoon.

0.title: Monday Afternoons
0.description: Join Marc as he plays the hits and chats about all sorts on Monday afternoons.

0.title: Evenings
0.description: Other radio stations might be playing soppy love songs. We’re playing great songs all evening long.

3.title: Rock Night
3.description: Thursday night is Rock Night at Solid Radio. Enjoy enough hair metal to be a fire hazard, soft rock to mellow Keith Richards and distorted electric guitar to make you question what a guitar should sound like.
